name: Beaded sash of the quickling
data: It increases the users dexterity strongly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than average.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'whirlwind attack'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
The sash occasionally quickens the attacks of the wearer.
